name: CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_ADJ
description: This table contains the claim adjustment (CAS) level information for a service line of a remittance record.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query.

columns.name: CAS_SERVICE_LINE
columns.description: This is the service line which this adjustment information refers.

columns.name: SVC_CAS_GRP_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the Code identifying the general category of payment adjustment.

columns.name: SVC_ADJ_REASON_CD
columns.description: This is the Code identifying the detailed reason the adjustment was made.

columns.name: SVC_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: This is the amount of the adjustment.

columns.name: SVC_ADJ_QTY
columns.description: This is the units of service being adjusted.
